attributes.action: Award Ant and Dec with a Knighthood from the Queen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to get Ant and Dec awarded with a knighthood! They should be known as Sir Ant McPartlin and Sir Declan Donnelly

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
